newsitem.title: BELGIUM: AEA data N Atlantic air cargo down 5.3pct in Dec.
newsitem.headline: AEA data N Atlantic air cargo down 5.3pct in Dec.

text.p: The Association of European Airlines (AEA) figures for December 1996, show that the North Atlantic trade has seen a significant decline in traffic.

The Europe-Sub Saharan Africa trade also fell by 1.1 percent to 168.4 million (revenue freight tonne kilometres (RTFK), but business in the North Atlantic saw a bigger decrease, when it fell by 5.3 percent to 661.3 nillion RTFK for December 1996, compared to the same month in 1995.
Europe-North Africa/Middle East trade saw the largest increase, climbing by 22.1 percent to 96.0 million RTFK in December, the data released from the AEA's Brussels headquarters, revealed:
*These figures relate to the international scheduled services of AEA member airlines.
- Reuters Air Cargo Newsroom Tel_+44 171 542 7706 Fax: 5017
